items.summary: Update the forum message display in the Section Detail page (frontend/src/pages/SectionDetailPage.tsx) so that each message shows the user's saved profile name as the author name instead of displaying the principal or an anonymous/unauthenticated fallback.

Update the backend forum message data structure and retrieval method so that when messages are fetched for a section, each message includes the author's saved profile name (if available) in addition to the principal, so the frontend can display the correct author name without separate profile lookups.
